title: How It All Vegan!: Irresistible Recipes for an Animal-Free Diet
description: Vegan food is fabulous food, full of flavor and all the nutrients you need. With fun illustrations and a cool, punky sensibility, How It All Vegan! will tempt you to join the Vegan Empire. "Written with sass, style, and a sense of humor. More than just a cookbook. . . ."â€” BUST
author: Tanya Barnard
